name: Operation Zero (Yeski)
description:
Operation Zero is a top down 2D shooter in which you have to survive a horde of different zombies coming at you. In this game you can only shoot if you're moving and can only reload if you stand still.

Controls:
WASD keys to move
L mouse button to shoot
R mouse button to reload

Good luck!

Sound effects are from Freesound.org
Game soundtrack is from Infrared Scale on youtube

Game assets are from tokka on Itch.io
